states.title: Definition
states.placeholder: Here you can paste the description of the phases to use for this $t(common.innovation-flow)

innovationHub.foreignSpace: This {{spaceDisplayName}} is not in the selection of current starting page. You are anyway very welcome to contribute. Enjoy exploring!

outsideOfSpace.forum: This is the general Alkemio $t(common.forum), outside of the {{space}} $t(common.space). You are very much invited to explore and contribute!
outsideOfSpace.subspaces: Here you can find all $t(common.subspaces) that are hosted on Alkemio, also the ones that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy exploring!
outsideOfSpace.contributors: Here you can find all people and $t(common.organizations) that are contributing on Alkemio, also in $t(common.spaces) that are not selected by {{space}}. Enjoy connecting!

innovationHub.goToMainPage: Interested in collaborating in other $t(common.spaces)? Click here to see them all on the universal Alkemio homepage.
